playGame() - Static method in class chaiyadet.nutsaba.lab4.SicBoV2
Game play, if choose 1, will get the value, type h or l, if choose h, the sum equals 11-18 to win, less than 11 is a loss, if choose l, the sum must be less than 11 to win, if greater than 10, lose, if selected 2 will choose numbers 1-6 If you choose the ball, you will win.
